title: La Chiwinha
description: A tea room/health food store/cultural gifts store. As of the beginning of 2014, the only fair trade tea shop in Puerto Rico. Serves local coffee, hot chocolate and shakes, acai and local, mostly organic, fresh fruits. Try the massala chai. Also offers in-house-made pastries. Vegan and gluten free alternatives are available. Uses only bio-compostable utensils, no plastic or foam. Free Wi-Fi.
